code: @Manual{,   title = {themeparks: An Interface to Themeparks.wiki},   author = {Lucy {D'Agostino McGowan}},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://lucymcgowan.github.io/themeparks/}, }

title: An Interface to Themeparks.wiki
text: goal themeparks allow R users access themeparks.wiki API.

title: An Interface to Themeparks.wiki
text: can install development version themeparks like :

title: An Interface to Themeparks.wiki
text: can access available destinations using get_destinations function: destination mind, can find information using get_entity function. example, want pull entity data Walt Disney World Resort, can use slug provided dataset (id). like available parks, attractions, dining, shows particular destination, can use get_entity_children. like extract live data particular attraction, can use get_entity_live_data: can also get current wait time data particular destination, example, Walt Disney World:
code: library(themeparks) get_destinations() #> # A tibble: 92 × 5 #>    destination_id            destination_name destination_slug park_id park_name #>    <chr>                     <chr>            <chr>            <chr>   <chr>     #>  1 259cf011-6195-42dd-bfdb-… Guangzhou Chime… chimelongguangz… 73436f… Chimelon… #>  2 259cf011-6195-42dd-bfdb-… Guangzhou Chime… chimelongguangz… 9a268a… Chimelon… #>  3 259cf011-6195-42dd-bfdb-… Guangzhou Chime… chimelongguangz… a148a9… Chimelon… #>  4 259cf011-6195-42dd-bfdb-… Guangzhou Chime… chimelongguangz… 7fa8dc… Chimelon… #>  5 9c6a0987-e519-4d6e-b011-… Walibi Holland   walibiholland    18635b… Walibi H… #>  6 6cc48df2-f126-4f28-905d-… Parc Asterix     parcasterix      9e9386… Parc Ast… #>  7 c0eddd5b-da82-4161-9a5f-… Plopsaland De P… plopsaland-de-p… f0ea9b… Plopsala… #>  8 119fce4a-9662-484f-ac3a-… California's Gr… californiasgrea… bdf9b5… Californ… #>  9 8fba5a14-8d04-455c-acf8-… Silver Dollar C… silverdollarcity d21fac… Silver D… #> 10 f9497403-adf3-4409-bd79-… Walibi Rhône-Al… walibirhonealpes 28aee1… Walibi R… #> # ℹ 82 more rows get_entity("waltdisneyworldresort") #> # A tibble: 1 × 9 #>   id     name  slug  location_latitude location_longitude location_points_of_i…¹ #>   <chr>  <chr> <chr>             <dbl>              <dbl> <lgl>                  #> 1 e957d… Walt… walt…              28.4              -81.6 NA                     #> # ℹ abbreviated name: ¹​location_points_of_interest #> # ℹ 3 more variables: timezone <chr>, entity_type <chr>, external_id <chr> get_entity_children("waltdisneyworldresort") #> # A tibble: 518 × 12 #>    id                       name  entity_type timezone children_id children_name #>    <chr>                    <chr> <chr>       <chr>    <chr>       <chr>         #>  1 e957da41-3552-4cf6-b636… Walt… DESTINATION America… 7f6e15e9-f… Hoop-Dee-Doo… #>  2 e957da41-3552-4cf6-b636… Walt… DESTINATION America… d7618a38-f… Amare         #>  3 e957da41-3552-4cf6-b636… Walt… DESTINATION America… a08d9f84-f… DiVine        #>  4 e957da41-3552-4cf6-b636… Walt… DESTINATION America… d90f0556-5… Stir          #>  5 e957da41-3552-4cf6-b636… Walt… DESTINATION America… 51392ca4-f… Main Street … #>  6 e957da41-3552-4cf6-b636… Walt… DESTINATION America… d3461b18-2… Pizza al Tag… #>  7 e957da41-3552-4cf6-b636… Walt… DESTINATION America… 796b0a25-c… Jungle Cruise #>  8 e957da41-3552-4cf6-b636… Walt… DESTINATION America… 99fc0f7d-6… Blue Ribbon … #>  9 e957da41-3552-4cf6-b636… Walt… DESTINATION America… 15107c34-6… Space 220 Lo… #> 10 e957da41-3552-4cf6-b636… Walt… DESTINATION America… 7ad20d41-f… Planet Holly… #> # ℹ 508 more rows #> # ℹ 6 more variables: children_entity_type <chr>, children_slug <chr>, #> #   children_parent_id <chr>, children_external_id <chr>, #> #   children_location_longitude <dbl>, children_location_latitude <dbl> get_entity_live_data("junglecruise") #> ℹ Pulling live data for Jungle Cruise #> # A tibble: 1 × 13 #>   id       name  entity_type park_id external_id status forecast operating_hours #>   <chr>    <chr> <chr>       <chr>   <chr>       <chr>  <list>   <list>          #> 1 796b0a2… Jung… ATTRACTION  75ea57… 80010153;e… OPERA… <df>     <df [1 × 3]>    #> # ℹ 5 more variables: last_updated <chr>, queue_standby_wait_time <int>, #> #   queue_return_time_state <chr>, queue_return_time_return_end <lgl>, #> #   queue_return_time_return_start <lgl> wdw_waits <- get_wait_times("waltdisneyworldresort") wdw_waits[order(-wdw_waits$wait_time), ] #> # A tibble: 102 × 2 #>    name                                           wait_time #>    <chr>                                              <int> #>  1 The Twilight Zone Tower of Terror™                   105 #>  2 Jungle Cruise                                         90 #>  3 Rainforest Cafe® at Disney Springs Marketplace        90 #>  4 TRON Lightcycle / Run                                 85 #>  5 Seven Dwarfs Mine Train                               75 #>  6 Guardians of the Galaxy: Cosmic Rewind                70 #>  7 Slinky Dog Dash                                       70 #>  8 Remy's Ratatouille Adventure                          70 #>  9 Meet Anna and Elsa at Royal Sommerhus                 65 #> 10 Frozen Ever After                                     65 #> # ℹ 92 more rows

title: Get destinations — get_destinations
text: Get list supported destinations available live API

title: Get destinations — get_destinations
text: data frame supported destinations following columns: destination_id destination_name destination_slug park_id park_name

title: Get entity document — get_entity
text: Get entity document

title: Get entity document — get_entity
text: entity_id Either GUID slug string given entity

title: Get entity document — get_entity
text: data frame details given entity

title: Get entity document — get_entity
code: ## Entity data for Walt Disney World # \donttest{ get_entity("waltdisneyworldresort") #> # A tibble: 1 × 9 #>   id     name  slug  location_latitude location_longitude location_points_of_i…¹ #>   <chr>  <chr> <chr>             <dbl>              <dbl> <lgl>                  #> 1 e957d… Walt… walt…              28.4              -81.6 NA                     #> # ℹ abbreviated name: ¹​location_points_of_interest #> # ℹ 3 more variables: timezone <chr>, entity_type <chr>, external_id <chr> # }

title: Get entity children — get_entity_children
text: Get children given entity document

title: Get entity children — get_entity_children
text: entity_id Either GUID slug string given entity

title: Get entity children — get_entity_children
text: data frame details given entity's children

title: Get entity children — get_entity_children
text: recursive, destination return parks rides within parks.

title: Get entity children — get_entity_children
code: ## Entity children data for Walt Disney World # \donttest{ get_entity_children("waltdisneyworldresort") #> # A tibble: 518 × 12 #>    id                       name  entity_type timezone children_id children_name #>    <chr>                    <chr> <chr>       <chr>    <chr>       <chr>         #>  1 e957da41-3552-4cf6-b636… Walt… DESTINATION America… 7f6e15e9-f… Hoop-Dee-Doo… #>  2 e957da41-3552-4cf6-b636… Walt… DESTINATION America… d7618a38-f… Amare         #>  3 e957da41-3552-4cf6-b636… Walt… DESTINATION America… a08d9f84-f… DiVine        #>  4 e957da41-3552-4cf6-b636… Walt… DESTINATION America… d90f0556-5… Stir          #>  5 e957da41-3552-4cf6-b636… Walt… DESTINATION America… 51392ca4-f… Main Street … #>  6 e957da41-3552-4cf6-b636… Walt… DESTINATION America… d3461b18-2… Pizza al Tag… #>  7 e957da41-3552-4cf6-b636… Walt… DESTINATION America… 796b0a25-c… Jungle Cruise #>  8 e957da41-3552-4cf6-b636… Walt… DESTINATION America… 99fc0f7d-6… Blue Ribbon … #>  9 e957da41-3552-4cf6-b636… Walt… DESTINATION America… 15107c34-6… Space 220 Lo… #> 10 e957da41-3552-4cf6-b636… Walt… DESTINATION America… 7ad20d41-f… Planet Holly… #> # ℹ 508 more rows #> # ℹ 6 more variables: children_entity_type <chr>, children_slug <chr>, #> #   children_parent_id <chr>, children_external_id <chr>, #> #   children_location_longitude <dbl>, children_location_latitude <dbl> # }

title: Get entity live data — get_entity_live_data
text: Get entity's live data (wait times, availability, parade times, etc.) well child entities.

title: Get entity live data — get_entity_live_data
text: entity_id Character. Either GUID slug string given entity. verbose Logical. Whether like messages print console.

title: Get entity live data — get_entity_live_data
text: data frame live data entity

title: Get entity live data — get_entity_live_data
code: ## Live data for Walt Disney World # \donttest{ get_entity_live_data("waltdisneyworldresort") #> ℹ Pulling live data for Walt Disney World® Resort #> # A tibble: 272 × 27 #>    id                  name  entity_type park_id external_id status last_updated #>    <chr>               <chr> <chr>       <chr>   <chr>       <chr>  <chr>        #>  1 bc1ffa86-9b1a-4ce9… Tree… ATTRACTION  1c84a2… 80010217;e… OPERA… 2022-09-30T… #>  2 ead53ea5-22e5-4095… Disn… PARK        NA      80007834;e… CLOSED 2024-06-07T… #>  3 ada6a611-31ef-426a… Runo… ATTRACTION  ead53e… 80010183;e… OPERA… 2025-02-26T… #>  4 2a55aee6-c87a-4bda… Tree… SHOW        1c84a2… 18447293;e… OPERA… 2025-02-24T… #>  5 888fb4a4-7adf-47a1… Main… ATTRACTION  75ea57… 80010165;e… CLOSED 2024-07-26T… #>  6 b61e138d-d0bd-4b3a… Narc… RESTAURANT  NA      90001983;e… OPERA… 2024-07-26T… #>  7 f8d2730d-1fcb-414e… Dona… SHOW        1c84a2… 18984704;e… CLOSED 2024-06-09T… #>  8 97e0cc07-cf2b-4d28… Star… ATTRACTION  288747… 18360041;e… CLOSED 2024-07-26T… #>  9 2b3e5eeb-0cbc-4d19… Cros… ATTRACTION  ead53e… 80010122;e… OPERA… 2025-02-26T… #> 10 97011c19-a864-4922… Chai… ATTRACTION  ead53e… 80010116;e… OPERA… 2025-02-26T… #> # ℹ 262 more rows #> # ℹ 20 more variables: operating_hours <list>, showtimes <list>, #> #   forecast <list>, dining_availability <list>, queue_standby_wait_time <int>, #> #   queue_return_time_state <chr>, queue_return_time_return_end <lgl>, #> #   queue_return_time_return_start <chr>, queue_single_rider_wait_time <lgl>, #> #   queue_paid_return_time_state <chr>, #> #   queue_paid_return_time_return_end <lgl>, … # }

title: Get entity schedule — get_entity_schedule
text: Get entity's schedule next 30 days

title: Get entity schedule — get_entity_schedule
text: entity_id Either GUID slug string given entity year Numeric. Year entity schedule (NULL default current year) month Numeric. Month entity schedule (NULL default current month)

title: Get entity schedule — get_entity_schedule
text: data frame schedule data entity

title: Get entity schedule — get_entity_schedule
code: ## Schedule data for Walt Disney World # \donttest{ get_entity_schedule("waltdisneyworldresort") #> # A tibble: 6 × 5 #>   id                                   name        entity_type timezone schedule #>   <chr>                                <chr>       <chr>       <lgl>    <list>   #> 1 75ea578a-adc8-4116-a54d-dccb60765ef9 Magic King… PARK        NA       <df>     #> 2 47f90d2c-e191-4239-a466-5892ef59a88b EPCOT       PARK        NA       <df>     #> 3 288747d1-8b4f-4a64-867e-ea7c9b27bad8 Disney's H… PARK        NA       <df>     #> 4 1c84a229-8862-4648-9c71-378ddd2c7693 Disney's A… PARK        NA       <df>     #> 5 b070cbc5-feaa-4b87-a8c1-f94cca037a18 Disney's T… PARK        NA       <df>     #> 6 ead53ea5-22e5-4095-9a83-8c29300d7c63 Disney's B… PARK        NA       <df>     # }

title: Get forecast — get_forecast
text: Get forecast

title: Get forecast — get_forecast
text: entity_id Character. Either GUID slug string given entity.

title: Get forecast — get_forecast
text: data frame forecast data three columns: time wait_time percentage

title: Get Wait Times — get_wait_times
text: Get Wait Times

title: Get Wait Times — get_wait_times
text: entity_id Character. Either GUID slug string given entity.

title: Get Wait Times — get_wait_times
text: data frame three columns: park name wait time

title: Get Wait Times — get_wait_times
code: ## Get wait time for the Jungle Cruise # \donttest{ get_wait_times("junglecruise") #> # A tibble: 1 × 2 #>   name          wait_time #>   <chr>             <int> #> 1 Jungle Cruise        50 # }
